isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - INSTALL - INSTALL HOOD GRILLE SURROUND (TRIM)

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Grille Surround (Trim) on 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To install the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1), have the hood assembly (Item 2) closed and latched.
Prepare the hood grille surround (trim) surface on the hood assembly (Item 2) by cleaning thoroughly before installation of the new hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1).
Once the hood grille surround (trim) surface on the hood assembly (Item 2) is cleaned, remove protective covering from the back of the new hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1).

Carefully position new grille surround trim (Item 1) in place at the bottom of the hood assembly (Item 2) and carefully push the hood grille surround (trim) toward the hood assembly. Once the hood grille surround (trim) is in place on the hood assembly, press it securely against the hood assembly all the way around the entire hood grille surround (trim).

Once the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1) is securely attached to the hood assembly (Item 2), install the grille assembly. Refer to Install Hood Grille on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA) and 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood .

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Grille Surround (Trim) on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 42 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To install the hood grille surround (trim) sections (Items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6), have the hood assembly (Item 7) closed and latched.
Position passenger side headlight bezel (Item 5) onto the hood assembly (Item 7) and install four sheet metal screws (Item 21) and tighten.
Position driver side headlight bezel (Item 6) onto the hood assembly (Item 7) and install four sheet metal screws (Item 21) and tighten.

Place two flat washers (Item 20, Section D - D) over the two hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs (Item 19, Section D - D) of the driver side hood grille surround (trim) (Item 4), then position hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs into the hood assembly (Item 7). Install two elastic stop lock nuts (Item 18, Section D - D) onto the two hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs securing the driver side hood grille surround (trim) to the hood assembly and tighten.

Place two flat washers (Item 17, Section C - C) over the two hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs (Item 16, Section C - C) of the passenger side hood grille surround (trim) (Item 3), then position hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs into the hood assembly (Item 7). Install two elastic stop lock nuts (Item 15, Section C - C) onto the two hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs securing the passenger side hood grille surround (trim) to the hood assembly and tighten.

Place four flat washers (Item 13, Section B - B) and four hood grille surround (trim) mounting clips (Item 14, Section B - B) over the four hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs (Item 12, Section B - B) of the lower hood grille surround (trim) (Item 2), then position hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs into the hood assembly (Item 7). Install four elastic stop lock nuts (Item 11, Section B - B) onto four hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs securing the lower hood grille surround (trim) to the hood assembly and tighten.

Place six flat washers (Item 10, Section A - A) over the six hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs (Item 9, Section A - A) of the top hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1), then position hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs into the hood assembly (Item 7). Install six elastic stop lock nuts (Item 8, Section A - A) onto six hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs securing the top hood grille surround (trim) to the hood assembly and tighten.
Install the hood grille assembly, refer to Install Hood Grille on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood .

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Grille Surround (Trim) on 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 43 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To install the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1), have the hood assembly (Item 2) closed and latched.
Prepare the hood grille surround (trim) surface on the hood assembly (Item 2) by cleaning thoroughly before installation of the new hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1).
Once the hood grille surround (trim) surface on the hood assembly (Item 2) is cleaned, remove protective covering from the back of the new hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1).
If the four speed nuts (Item 5) on the hood assembly (Item 2) were removed, install the four speed nuts before installing the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1).

Carefully position new grille surround trim (Item 1) in place at the bottom of the hood assembly (Item 2) and carefully push the hood grille surround (trim) toward the hood assembly. Once the hood grille surround (trim) is in place on the hood assembly, press it securely against the hood assembly all the way around the entire hood grille surround (trim).
Position hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1) at the four speed nuts (Item 5) on the hood assembly (Item 2) and install four hex bolts (Item 3) with flat washers (Item 4) and tighten.

Once the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1) is securely attached to the hood assembly (Item 2), install the grille assembly. Refer to Install Hood Grille on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA) and 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood .

svcsubproc.title: Install Grille/Radiator Trim on 5600 i (SBA) With Optional Butterfly Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 44 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: If removed, position the radiator fill cap (Item 10) on top of the upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1). Install two pan head mach. screws (Item 24) through the radiator fill cap and two water outlet spacers (Item 25) into the radiator fill cap mounting plate (Item 26) and tighten.

If separated, position the passenger side grille/radiator trim (Item 4) together with the passenger side hood corner panel (Item 5). Install three pan head mach. screws with lock washers (Items 22 and 23) through the passenger side hood corner panel into weldnuts on the passenger side grille/radiator trim and tighten, passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install the driver side grille/radiator trim (Item 2) to the driver side hood corner panel (Item 3).

Position the driver side grille/radiator trim (Item 2) and driver side hood corner panel (Item 3) at the grille/radiator trim radiator mounting bracket (Item 13). Install four hex bolts with lock washers (Items 11 and 12) through the grille/radiator trim radiator mounting bracket into weldnuts on the driver side grille/radiator trim, do not tighten, driver side shown.

Position the driver side grille/radiator trim (Item 2) at both grille/radiator trim radiator mounting braces (Item 17). Install four pan head mach. screws with lock washers and flat washers (Items 14, 15 and 16) through the driver side grille/radiator trim into the weldnuts of both grille/radiator trim radiator mounting braces, do not tighten, driver side shown.

Position the driver side hood corner panel (Item 3) at both grille/radiator trim radiator mounting braces (Item 17). Install two pan head mach. screws (Item 18) through the driver side hood corner panel into both grille/radiator trim radiator mounting braces and install two hex nuts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 19, 20 and 21) and tighten, driver side shown.
Once all of the mounting hardware has been installed, go back and tighten four hex bolts (Item 11) and four pan head mach. screws (Item 14), driver side shown.
To install the passenger side grille/radiator trim (Item 4) and passenger side hood corner panel (Item 5), repeat steps 4, 5, 6 and 7 above.

note.para: It the radiator fill cap (Item 10) was removed be sure to install it on the upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1) before upper grille/radiator trim is installed.

step1.para: Position the upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1) and driver side grille/radiator trim (Item 2) on top of the grille/radiator trim mounting bracket (Item 9). Install two hex bolts (Item 6) through the upper grille/radiator trim, driver side grille/radiator trim and grille/radiator trim mounting bracket and install hex nuts with lock washers (Items 7 and 8), do not tighten, driver side shown.

Position the upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1) and passenger side grille/radiator trim (Item 4) on top of the grille/radiator trim mounting bracket on the passenger side of the radiator. Install two hex bolts through the upper grille/radiator trim, passenger side grille/radiator trim and grille/radiator trim mounting bracket and install hex nuts with lock washers and tighten.

Once all of the mounting hardware has been installed, go back and tighten four hex bolts (Item 6) and hex nuts (Item 7) on the driver side. Also tighten four hex bolts (Item 11), four pan head mach. screws (Item 14) and two pan head mach. screws and hex nuts (Items 18 and 19) on both driver and passenger sides.
Install the radiator shell hood seals; refer to Install Radiator Shell Hood Seals on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood .
Install the grille; refer to Install Grille on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood .
Install the butterfly hood assembly; refer to Install Optional Butterfly Hood on 5600 i (SBA) .
